sentences.sContent: Vivian: So you actually have billion dollars?
sentences.sContent_eng: Vivian: So you actually have billion dollars?
sentences.sCn: 维维安:  你真的有十亿美元吗？

sentences.sContent: The new estimates now tell us that more than one billion people experience some form of disability.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new estimates now tell us that more than one billion people experience some form of disability.
sentences.sCn: 最新估计数字现在使我们看到，有十多亿人存有某种形式的残疾情况。

words.tran: 十亿分之一的；第十亿的
